name: ignitefrontend
description: Client app for the Ignite VFX pipeline
author: George Savvas <ignite@georgesavvas.co.uk>

scripts.electron-dev: npm run sanitize && concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev electron ."
scripts.package-win: npm run build && npm run copy-backend-win && electron-packager . --overwrite --icon=public/media/desktop_icon/win/ignite.ico --prune=true --out=dist --version-string.CompanyName=GeorgeSavvas --version-string.FileDescription=IgniteClientDescription --version-string.ProductName="Ignite VFX Pipeline"
scripts.package-mac: npm run build && electron-packager . --overwrite --icon=public/media/desktop_icon/mac/ignite.icns --prune=true --out=dist && npm run copy-backend-linux
scripts.package-linux: npm run build && electron-packager . --overwrite --icon=public/media/desktop_icon/win/ignite.png --prune=true --asar=true --out=dist && npm run copy-backend-linux
